mapper.delete: delete from b_friend where userid=#{userid} and friendid=#{friendid}
mapper.update: update b_friend set alias=#{alias} where userid=#{userid} and friendid=#{friendid}
update b_friend set groupid=#{groupid} where userid=#{userid} and friendid=#{friendid}
mapper.select: select f.*,s.phonenumber,s.nick,s.headimg,imaccount,lastlocation[0] as lon,lastlocation[1] as lat from b_friend f,s_user s where f.userid=s.id and f.userid=#{userid}

select f.*,s.phonenumber,s.nick,s.headimg,imaccount,lastlocation[0] as lon,lastlocation[1] as lat from b_friend f,s_user s,b_localgroup lg where f.userid=s.id and lg.id=f.localgroupid and f.userid=#{userid} and f.localgroupid=#{groupid}
select f.*,s.phonenumber,s.nick,s.headimg,imaccount,lastlocation[0] as lon,lastlocation[1] as lat from b_friend f,s_user s where f.userid=s.id and f.userid=#{userid} and f.friendid=#{friendid}
